explanation: The stage direction 'Il prend une lettre dans sa poche et va la poser sur la bûche.' involves a character interacting with an object (a letter). The verb 'prend' (takes) and the action of placing the letter on the log ('bûche') clearly indicate an interaction with an object, which fits the definition of category 10 (object).
stgdir: Il prend une lettre dans sa poche et va la poser sur la bûche.
